Create a virtual try-on feature for glasses: Develop a mobile application that allows users to upload a photo of themselves and try on different styles of glasses virtually. This feature could be particularly useful for those who are unable to visit an optometrist or try on glasses in-person.

Develop a customizable glasses frame: Create a platform that allows users to design their own glasses frame by selecting the shape, color, and material. This could be a great way for individuals to express their personal style and create a unique pair of glasses.

Create a subscription service for glasses: Offer a monthly subscription service that delivers a new pair of glasses to customers on a regular basis. This could be a great way for individuals to try out different styles and keep their glasses up-to-date.

Develop a glasses repair service: Create a service that allows customers to send in their broken glasses and have them repaired or replaced. This could be a great way for individuals to extend the life of their glasses and save money in the long run.

Create a virtual reality glasses experience: Develop a virtual reality experience that allows users to explore different environments and activities while wearing glasses. This could be a great way to showcase the benefits of glasses and how they can enhance one's overall experience.
